**About Gaussian**
Gaussian provides state-of-the-art capabilities for electronic structure modeling. It contains every scientific/modeling feature, and none imposes any artificial limitations on calculations other than your computing resources and patience.
**Home page**: http://www.gaussian.com/
**Input**: http://www.gaussian.com/g_tech/g_ur/m_input.htm
